casebody.data:
SELLARS
v.
PERRY. No. 415P13-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2015. Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Mr. Kelvin W. Sellars, for Sellars, Kelvin W.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2015 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2015."
